mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter from C. M. Stigleman to his Wife Ellen
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated January 12, 1862 from C. M. Stigleman to his wife Ellen, sent from “Camp near Union Mills.” 1 original piece and partial transcription on back of Zion Lutheran Church program dated April 7, 1996.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
